name: Slimebo
description:
Slimebo is centered  around the gladiatorial combat event of the millennia "SLIMEBO!" It pits player against player in a championship royale. Play as reigning champions Yellow Yuri or Purple Peter as they duke it out for the entertainment of billions.

Featuring:

True Slime Immersion:

Immerse yourself in the slime lifestyle. Stick to the arena walls, falls from great heights without worry and utilize your body as a weapon.

Travel the World:

The "SLIMEBO!" championship will see you travelling to all corner of the world from icy mountain tops to deep below the earth. The world is you arena!

You're Not Alone:

You cant win the "SLIMEBO!" championship without a worthy opponent bring alone a friend (or enemy) and fight it out in this local co-op arena shooter.
